document.full_text: the playwright sharr white has embraced the practical way in which he lives his life in his creative endeavors, and the approach has helped make his play 'the other place' his first major new york production.
document.title: creating plays, but holding on to the day job
lines_and_colors: the playwright sharr white has embraced the practical way in which he lives his life in his creative endeavors, and the approach has helped make his play 'the other place' his first major new york production.
